Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • Inventory

  • public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores the methods and variables used for a player's inventory.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Tom Cordall and Josiah Richards

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Inventory()
      Creates an empty Inventory.
      Inventory(Inventory referenceInventory)
      Clones a reference inventory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addItem(Collectable item)
      Adds a collectable to the items in this inventory.
      void addTokens(int amount)
      Adds an amount of tokens to this inventory.
      void clearItems()
      Clears the list of collectables stored in this inventory.
      java.util.ArrayList<Collectable> getItems()
      Gets the list of collectables stored in this inventory.
      java.lang.String getMetaInfo()
      This method gets the information about each item within the items list.
      int getNumTokens()
      Gets the number of tokens stored in this inventory.
      boolean hasAndConsumeKey(java.awt.Color color)
      Searches the list for a key of a specific colour if the player has it then it is removed.
      boolean hasBoots(Boot.BootType bootType)
      Checks that the player has a boot of a specific type.
      void setNumTokens(int numTokens)
      Sets the number of tokens stored in this inventory.

        Returns:
        A boolean value.
